greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 2*n - prevprime(2*n).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..5000
program: (MAGMA) [2*n - NthPrime(#PrimesUpTo(2*n)): n in [2..50]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Dec 05 2017
(PARI) for(n=2,50, print1(2*n - precprime(2*n), ", ")) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Dec 05 2017
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
